item.description: Sivers on delegation explaing philopsohy put it to down if else end write a manual Good book on this subject"Emyth revisited”” Breaking Bad habits I want to bring down my web surfing step 1: creating a good habit. so reading something productive step 2: look at untanling. try removing the prompt for me it is the empty browser. make ti hard, remove th emotivation, may be adding a site blocker step 3: if no sccess still, try to swap in with good behaviour act that needs low skill and motivation
